content:
Noob question - working with some generated code, and I'm seeing a lot of crates hand-roll the list of reserved keywords here: https://doc.rust-lang.org/reference/keywords.html

Is there a better solution? Is there some API I'm struggling to find that basically just implements:

pub fn is_keyword(&str) -> bool;

I know this is simple, but it smells to me like "I shouldn't be maintaining this list myself" sorta code
(If the answer is "you should make a crate", I'm happy to do that, but wanted to cast a net first and see if there was something I'm missing)
Maybe when rust-analyzer and rustc are going to share the same parser in the future, but at the moment I don't think there is a crate for that
